components.description:
An ancient scroll, unrolled to reveal text on papyrus or parchment paper. May be used to represent the study of history or official documents, such as a diploma.

Many platforms indicate text with dark lines. WhatsApp’s design includes wooden rollers. Apple’s design features an easter egg, script of text from its 1997–2002 Crazy Ones/Think Different ad campaign:

…rebels. The troublemakers. The round pegs in the square holes. The ones who see things differently. They're not fond of rules. And they have no respect for the status quo. You can quote them, disagree with them, glorify or vilify them. About the only thing you can't do is ignore…
components.title: Scroll

description:

Many platforms indicate text with dark lines. WhatsApp’s design includes wooden rollers. Apple’s design features an easter egg, script of text from its 1997–2002 Crazy Ones/Think Different ad campaign:

…rebels. The troublemakers. The round pegs in the square holes. The ones who see things differently. They're not fond of rules. And they have no respect for the status quo. You can quote them, disagree with them, glorify or vilify them. About the only thing you can't do is ignore…
title: Scroll

version.description:
Released in October 2010, Unicode 6.0 was the first version of the Unicode Standard to support emoji.

Some characters in prior versions of Unicode were retroactively updated to provide an emoji presentation. This release was the first to introduce new characters for the sole purpose of compatability with emojis being used in Japan.

emoji_net_data.category: Miscellaneous Symbols And Pictographs -> Office symbols
emoji_net_data.definition: An ancient scroll on papyrus,Â with shorter versions known as a roll. The Apple version of this emoji contains the following words: Hereâ€™s to http://emojipedia.org/scroll/
emoji_net_data.name: scroll

bn:00092424v: Interpret something that is written or printed

bn:00085489v: To construct by mental labor; to think up; particularly, to produce or create a literary or musical work.
To write, especially a literary or artistic work; to compose
To produce or create a literary or musical work.
To construct by mental labor; to think up.

bn:00028015n: Writing that provides information (especially information of an official nature)
A document is a written or drawn representation of thoughts.
Written or drawn representation of thoughts

bn:00060464n: A material made of cellulose pulp derived mainly from wood or rags or certain grasses
A sheet material used for writing on or printing on (or as a non-waterproof container), usually made by draining cellulose fibres from a suspension in water.
Material mainly used for writing upon, printing upon, drawing or for packaging
Felted or matted sheets of cellulose fibers, formed on a fine-wire screen from a dilute water suspension, and bonded together as the water is removed and the sheet is dried.
Paper is a thin material produced by pressing together moist fibers, typically cellulose pulp derived from wood, rags or grasses, and drying them into flexible sheets.

apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the scroll emoji is depicted as an ancient, rolled-up parchment, its edges slightly frayed and its surface textured to suggest aged paper.  The realistic lighting and subtle shading on Appleâ€™s rendering give it a distinct depth, making it look like a tangible artifact ready to be unrolled.  This emoji beautifully symbolizes history, tradition, important documents, or the act of reading and learning, evoking a sense of timelessness and knowledge conveyed with Appleâ€™s characteristic polish.
